title: Oregon university font
content:
I know the O is Melior, but what font is the oregon.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116105801im_/http:/typophile.com/files/5598_6395.png)
author: Capnhud

comments.content:
Slightly adjusting/customizing and stretching 'Handel (Gothic)' may get you close enough.

Dav

That inserting the melior O into Oregon and I just may have it.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here

I'm not sure that it's Melior for the 'O' - the sides of the counter in your sample seem a lot straighter. It could just be a custom job.

- Lex
